reviewText: Subtracted one star only because of the lack of special features. The halftime analysis and postgame ceremony are great, but I really would have liked some behind the scenes footage and One Shining Moment. However, what is there is great. The picture quality is very close to live quality, so I get to relive the awesomeness of Duke's 5th national title. Definitely worth the buy.
great
For an avid Duke fan, this is great and the price much less than at other places.
Being that I am a Duke Fan! I just love it!! I can watch it over & over! Keep going Duke & Coach K!!!!
yes this one is for keeps. too bad the referees had to play a big part in the outcome. all you have to do is watch the last 10 minutes for proof.

Love to see the Dukies win!
The fact that Duke won made me like it even more.

For the last 4 years I have been trying to get the NCAA championship game released on Blu-Ray, finally in 2015 the game was released both on a Blu-Ray disc and in the same case a DVD disc. The Blu-Ray disc played normally, the picture quality was high definition Blu-Ray quality.
I had previously phoned Team Marketing in April and they assured me that the DVD release had both a HD Blu-Ray disc and a DVD disc.
Thanks to Team Marketing and the NCAA for finally releasing the game on Blu-Ray.
If only the NBA would realize that they can grow a new sales line by releasing some playoff series on high definition Blu-Ray.
I believe the 2014 finals and the 2015 finals would sell enough to be profitable.
I purchased the Blu-Ray/DVD from Amazon.ca.
